Entry.JapaneseText: 角のあるガジュマが「特等民」、羽のあるのが 「優良民」、その他が「二級民」という事か。
Entry.EnglishText: So horned Gajuma are Superior Citizens, those with wings are Greater Citizens, and the rest are Lesser Citizens...

Entry.JapaneseText: それでヒューマが「劣等民」だとさ。
Entry.EnglishText: And then Huma are considered Inferiors.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、私はどうなのかしらね？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, what would I be then?
You wanna go ask the Chieftan?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……団結のためと言っていたが、 あまりうまくいっていない感じがするが……
Entry.EnglishText: ...He said this was being done for the sake of solidarity, but I feel as though things are not going so well...

Entry.JapaneseText: 急場しのぎの階級制など誰も受け入れられない。 いずれ破たんするだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: No one is going to accept an arbitrary class system. It's eventually going to come crashing down.
